entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High 11. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
